definitions: any plant that grows along the ground, around another plant, or up a wall by means of extending stems or branches.
shortDefinitions: plant that grows along ground or up wall

definitions: any of a number of small birds that creep around in trees or vegetation.

notes.text: ('brown creeper') the American treecreeper (Certhia americana, family Certhiidae)
('brown creeper') (New Zealand) a New Zealand songbird (Mohoua novaeseelandiae or Finschia novaeseelandiae, family Pachycephalidae or Acanthizidae)
a Philippine songbird (family Rhabdornithidae and genus Rhabdornis: two species)
a Hawaiian honeycreeper (genus Paroreomyza, family Drepanididae: three species)

definitions: a person whose behavior toward or interest in someone is regarded as unwelcome and socially inappropriate (typically used of a man)

examples.text: I could dance there without a creeper walking up and accosting me

shortDefinitions: person whose behaviour towards another is inappropriate

definitions: a low, wheeled platform on which a mechanic lies while working on the underside of a motor vehicle.
shortDefinitions: platform on which mechanic lies while working under motor vehicle
